title: Long Sleeve Dress Shirts for Men - Regular-Fit Casual Button-Down Shirt with Pockets
description: Men's dress shirt fabric is made of a blend of cotton and polyester fibers, the fabric is soft, comfortable and breathable to wear.

Classic lapels for knotting a variety of ties and bow ties. With chest pockets, the classic design holds all your essentials. Adjustable cuffs, two button positions for size adjustment and a better fit on the wrist.

Classic Men's Formal Long Sleeve Shirts are great for business/wedding/party/date/work/concert/casual etc. Suitable for all seasons and occasions. It is also the perfect gift for dad/husband/boyfriend/and someone you care about.
Our men's dress shirts are USA regular fit version. Available in a variety of sizes and colors. Please refer to the size chart to choose the size that suits you.
For daily care, you can hand wash or machine wash in cold water, do not bleach, and hang to dry. Iron at low temperature if necessary.
